_description: True esteem — one monorhyming quatrain translating ‘Vera sine simulacione dupplicitatis…’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Trewe withouten quey[n]tise & feininggeLesingge withouten deceyte
                    & chaunggingeKinde withouten hope of werdli winningge& clene
                    withouten enticing to sinningge
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 14.
